SEARCH
Package com.platform.user.api

Class UserManagementServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.platform.user.api.UserManagementServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserManagementServiceInterface
@Service public class UserManagementServiceImpl extends Object implements UserManagementServiceInterface
Implementation of UserManagementServiceInterface that bridges the API and internal layers. This service converts between internal entities and API DTOs.
